participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, always up for trying new tricks on his skateboard.
participant_1.background: my favourite skater is rob dryden. i'm always wearing a hat. i'm a skateboarder. i've a broken arm. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Friendly and down-to-earth, she loves sharing her passion for country music.
participant_2.background: my favourite music is country music. i drive a nissan pathfinder. i've short brown hair. i'm a convenience store manager.
